newsitem.title: JAPAN: Tokyo aluminium ends directionless day mixed.
newsitem.headline: Tokyo aluminium ends directionless day mixed.

text.p: Tokyo yen-based aluminium futures closed mixed on Tuesday, with buying from speculators partly offsetting the metal's fall in London overnight, traders said.
"We've seen some buying by speculators," said one trader. "But the metal doesn't look good on the LME. It looks ready to test $1,580 as we move towards a season of lower demand."
The benchmark June contract added 0.2 yen to end at 187.1 yen, while the April shed 0.2 yen to stand at 188.4.
Others were between 1.7 yen higher to 1.9 yen weaker.
In London overnight, three-month aluminium finished down $20 at $1,580, giving up its grip on the key $1,600 level, hit by a decline in copper.
